name: ev-charging-platform
description: Comprehensive EV Charging Platform connecting drivers with charging infrastructure

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:user-service" "npm run dev:station-service" "npm run dev:charging-service" "npm run dev:payment-service" "npm run dev:reservation-service" "npm run dev:notification-service"
scripts.build: npm run build:services && npm run build:apps
scripts.build:services: npm run build:user-service && npm run build:station-service && npm run build:charging-service && npm run build:payment-service && npm run build:reservation-service && npm run build:notification-service
scripts.test: npm run test:services && npm run test:apps
scripts.test:services: npm run test:user-service && npm run test:station-service && npm run test:charging-service && npm run test:payment-service && npm run test:reservation-service && npm run test:notification-service
scripts.lint: npm run lint:services && npm run lint:apps
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:services:fix && npm run lint:apps:fix
